Packages
com.sun.jndi.ldap.ctl Contains sort, virtual-list-view, and paged-results controls.

 

Controls based on Internet drafts of LDAP v3 controls.

Controls in the com.sun.jndi.ldap package:

ManageDsaIT control ManageReferralControl
PersistentSearch control PersistentSearchControl
EntryChangeResponseControl
control superclass BasicControl
